name: Convergence Compulsion (itch)
description:
A stealthy, hacky, robotic first person puzzle game.

Each room has an Exit button. You must reach this exit button and place your hand on it ("Interact Tool"). In some rooms, there are traps and enemies that you must get around in order to reach the exit. Some of these enemies can defeat you, so you must be clever. Use hacking and distractions to overcome obstacles.

There are 8 levels in the initial jam version of the game.
